question:
(a) Sequentially write five steps in making fried fish-in-batter.

(b) Write three steps in making batter.
answer:
(a) Sequential Steps in the Preparation of Fried Fish in Batter; (i) Clean the fish (ii) Fillet the fish (iii) Pass through the flour (iv) Pass through batter (v) Deep fry and drain OR

(i) Prepare batter (ii) Clean/prepare the fish (iii) Pass through the flour (iv) Pass through batter (v) Deep fry and drain

(b) Basic Procedures for Making Batter; -Sift the flour and other dry ingredients/sieve the flour and salt into a basin. - Make a well in the flour and add the liquid (egg, milk, oil or water). - Beat to a smooth mixture/mix until smooth/mix thoroughly.

question:
(a) Define Cocktail.

(b)(i) List five ingredients in making non-alcoholic cocktail 

(ii) List two ingredients in garnishing cocktail.
answer:
(a) Definition of Cocktail; A mixed short drink of about 10cl OR A mixed alcoholic beverage with two or more ingredients/a mixture of spirit with two or more ingredients/ a mixture of spirit with two or  ore ingredients. OR A mixture of two or more fruit juice.

(b) Ingredients used in the Preparation of Non-alcoholic Cocktails; -Sugar (cubes, syrup, castor, granulated). -Fruit juices. -Ice cubes. -Aerated water/carbonated water/soda water/lemonade. -Mint leaves. -Lemon. -Fruit drinks. -Lime. -Angostura/other bitters. -Grenadine syrup. -Ginger. -Zobo. -Egg. -Cloves. -Water

(c) Food Items for Garnishing Non-alcoholic Cocktails; -Strawberry. -Cocktail onion. -Celery. -Carrot. -Apple. -Cherry. -Pineapple. -Candied ginger. -Cinnamon. -Cucumber. -Lime. -Lemon. -Orange. -Olive.

question:
(a) Write three ingredients in making clear soup (consomme).

(b) Write five steps in making clear soup (consomme).
answer:
(a) Basic Ingredients in the Preparation of Clear Soup (consomme); -Stock/brown stock/white stock. -Egg white. -Bouquet garni. -Mixed vegetable (onion, carrot, celery, leek) (at least 2 vegetables). -Beef/meat/chicken/fish. -Pepper corn. 

(b) Procedure for the Preparation of Clear Soup (consomme); (i) Mix the minced beef, salt and egg white into the stock. (ii) Add chopped vegetables and bouquet garni (iii) Bring to boil and stir occasionally. (iv) Simmer gently/lower the heat for soup simmer. (v) Strain and skim/remove all fat.

question:
(a) Write three uses of salad. 

(b) Write five steps in making vegetable salad.
answer:
(a) Uses of Salads; -As a food accomplishment. -As a cold dish. -As a dessert/sweet course. -as a main dish. -As a starter/hors d'oeuvre. -Used during dinner. -As one of the dishes on a buffet table.

(b) Steps in the Preparation of Vegetable Salad; (i) Trim/peel the vegetables and wash thoroughly (ii) Cut/cho/shred/slice/dice the vegetables (iii) Blanch the vegetables/cook in salted water (iv) Arrange the vegetables neatly/mix the vegetables (v) Garnish/dress neatly/correct the seaoning and chill.
